virtual bool iwiz::CWizardDocumentComp::IsPageSelectionAllowed ( int  pageIndex) const [virtual]

Check, if selection of some wizard page is allowed.

It is used to avoid trying switch to inactive pages.

Parameters:
pageIndexindex of page. It has the same interpretation as e.g. index in iprm::IParamsManager::GetParamsSet or index in iprm::ISelectionConstraints::GetOptionName.

Implements iwiz::IParamsManagerWizard.
